website_summaries.verdict: Does a very good job of getting your space warm quickly.
pros: Better heat than larger ceramic or forced-air heaters
Produces enough heat to lower your heating bills
Includes an alert alarm if it gets knocked over
cons: Sometimes this heater can seem like it's putting off too much heat

customer_reviews.title: My cats worship this heat dish!
customer_reviews.text: This heater delivers on all promises! It warms quickly and does focus the heat so you are not trying to warm a large area and wasting the heating power. It is also extremely light and easy to move. Definitely more energy and cost efficient than my other small space heater. When you are chilled and sit near it the heat seriously feels like a warm hug. My cats worship it as a god, second only to sunbeams. I actually had to get a second one so I could use it and not jockey for position with the cats. Great for offices where you are freezing and just want to warm yourself and not office mates.
customer_reviews.author: janamisu

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than ceramic heaters twice the size
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the heat this little heater produces. I was trying to heat up a small area of my garage so that I could work out there. I tried several ceramic heater and some other tall forced air heaters to be able to work comfortably in my garage. None of the heaters did an adequate job of keeping me or the space warm. This parabolic heater worked great, almost too well. I initially turned it on high but soon had to put it on the low setting. Almost made me open the doors to the 20 degree cold to cool the room down.
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Nice Room Heater
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Presto Heat Dish Heaters. I ordered this one for my mother who is always cold. We haven't had any problems... no off-gassing or strange smells. Just plugged it in and it does it's job. It keeps my elderly mother bathed in warmth, so she is happy. Not to mention the two cats, who think we bought it for them! And, although it does heat the entire room I'm happy because I can sit in the same room without being hot. Just aim it towards those who are cold and those who are more warm blooded can benefit from the heat, without having to be bathed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Very warm. Sometimes too warm so don't stand too close. Hard to clean so we got canned air to blow the dust out. Have to stay on top of that. But so warm and feels like sun rays so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This Presto Heat Dish Parabolic Electric Heater should be referred to as a "portable fireplace." The fast-acting, and bone-penetrating heat that it throws off is so thoroughly warm and cozy, it truly feels just like you're sitting next to a roaring wood fire. It easily heats a small room in your home, even when the outside weather is cold and windy. I've enjoyed this exceptional heater for over 10 years without any failures; and had to purchase a replacement only because the first one was damaged during a move. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rick R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice heat but cheaply made and over priced.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for several years and loved it during the winter. I had to replace it when one of my cat's toys flew inside of it and burned on the heating coil. This newer model is more cheaply made and cost twice as much! It also has an annoying clicking sound and shoots out a flash of light when it automatically increases the heat. It does save me lots of money on my heating bill.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Best Parabolic Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is the sixth of these heaters we have purchased over the last 5-6 years. In Utah, we heated our entire house using 3 of them and they lasted, going full blast, for at least 3 years. This was much cheaper than using our propane central heat. We live in a more temperate climate now, so the one we recently purchased is used in our family room to give a little added warmth so that we can keep our winter thermostat on 68 degrees for the rest of the house. Our cats love it and snuggle up right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Derzunk

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Directs heat in front of it as if ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Directs heat in front of it as if it was a fan or something. Saw one at my friend's house and had to buy one. You won't regret it. It almost gets too hot if you're too close to it, but I'm not going to knock the product for working too well. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Almost started a fire in my outlet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my heater since Dec 30, 2017. I was very pleased with it until recently. I loved how fast it heats up and the warmth that it radiates. However, recently it has started to smell “HOT” when plugged in. Once this started I unplugged heater from the wall & not only was the plug HOT, my outlet has a small brown heat mark and was hot as well. Really disappointed that I will no longer be able to use this due to being a fire hazard! This is the time of year I need it the most! Anyone else experience this?? Even the cord was HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even the dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this heater. Certainly helps with the heating bills.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

product_meta.title: Presto Heat Dish Plus Parabolic Electric Heater
product_meta.description: Presto HeatDish Parabolic Heater Plus Footlight Feels Like 3 Times the Heat, Costs 1/3 Less to Operate than Ordinary Electric Heaters. The PRESTO HeatDish Plus Footlight parabolic electric heater uses a computer-designed parabolic reflector to focus heat, like a satellite dish concentrates TV signals, so it feels three times warmer than 1500 watt heaters, yet uses a third less energy. Because it warms you directly, you feel the heat almost instantly without first heating the entire room. Features: Focuses heat where it's needed most ... on you! Keeps you toasty warm so there is no need to heat the entire room. Costs a third less to operate than 1500 watt heaters. Because it uses just 1000 watts, it can help save enough on electric bills to pay for itself in as little as one year. Handy top-mounted thermostatic control maintains the desired temperature automatically.
feature_bullets: Feels like three times the heat of a 1500 watt convection
Focuses heat where it's needed most - on You! Virtually instant heat.
Helps save money. Costs a third ledd to operate than 1500 watt heaters.
Safeguard protection! Turns off automatically in case of accidental tip over. Handy built-in cord wrap for convenient storage
120 Volts AC, 1000 Watts. Ideal for office and home use
